name: Labyrinth Dungeon
description:
Explore a maze with multiple floors and seamless transitions between. Find keys to unlock doors as you progress. You will need to think in 3 dimensions to find the right way to go!

Features:

-7 floors with seamless movement when travelling between them!
-Multiple types of doors!

-Shiny keys!

-Intuitive Touch Controls!

-That’s about it!

-No seriously, we’re done here!

-Still here? … um, okay, it has, um … CAKE! (that’s a lie)
